metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  In a skillet, cook ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.  Stir in marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.

• 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/2 cucumber, diced • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 1/4 cup black olives, sliced • 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 2 tablespoons olive oil • 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar • Salt and pepper to taste
 In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water.  In a large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium heat.  Cook sliced chicken until browned, then set aside.
: o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked. o Stir in chopped parsley, cumin, cinnamon, salt, and pepper. o Cut phyllo dough into strips and brush with melted butter.

• 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed • 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/2 cucumber, diced • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 2 tablespoons olive oil • 1 tablespoon lemon juice • Salt and pepper to taste

: o Mix rice flour, coconut milk, water, turmeric, and salt to form a batter. o Sauté sliced pork, shrimp, and diced onion until cooked. o Heat oil in a pan and pour in a ladle of batter, swirling to coat the pan.
 Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Sauté onion, garlic, zucchini, and bell pepper until tender.

: o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest. o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked. o Roll out dough and cut into circles.
: o Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in a pot until translucent. o Add diced tomatoes and cumin, cook for 5 minutes.
: o Cut tofu into cubes and set aside. o Sauté ground pork, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned. o Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes.
 Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  Cut a pocket into each chicken breast.  In a bowl, mix spinach, feta, sun-dried tomatoes, and garlic.

 In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.  Cook cubed chicken and sliced sausage until browned, then set aside.  In the same pot, sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened.
